name: System Overhaul (Sofia)
description:
System Overhaul is a university project done in a group.

System Overhaul is a 3D Single-Player, third-person Action-Adventure game for Windows and macOS. (Only the Windows version is available here).

Story:

On another distant planet, where everyone wears helmets to identify their faction and aid them in their everyday life through the use of AI that’s built into the helmet. Once civilization started to evolve, someone took it as a chance to get power and became the first dictator on the planet. After that, the dictator divided people into different areas. Some years later, the main character, Robert, decided that they had enough and would fight against the system and the people in power.
